explanation: [0-0] A soccer player in a purple and blue jersey and long socks is bent over with his hands hanging down. In front of him is a white soccer ball and a yellow flag. Behind the soccer player, there is a man and a woman in orange uniforms, and another man in a blue shirt and black shorts holding a flag. Behind them is a beige background.

[0-6] The soccer player in the purple and blue jersey straightens up, and then a banana falls from above. The two men in orange turn around to look at the banana on the ground. Then a yellow circle appears around the banana, with the word "BANANA" in yellow font above it. The soccer player in the purple and blue jersey walks forward, bends down, and picks up the banana. The number 22 is written on the back of his jersey. Behind him, someone in the stands is holding a white banner with red and black text. A referee in a blue shirt is also standing below the stands. The camera then cuts to the soccer player, number 22, peeling the banana and eating it. Afterward, player number 22 walks forward, chewing.
